'''Yára''' is the [[Quenya]] word for ''old''<ref>{{PE|22c}}, pp. 118-119</ref> or ''ancient''.<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies]], pp. 358, 399</ref>

==Etymology==
[[PQ]] *''jârâ'' < [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[YA]] (and probably influence from [[GYER]])

==Other forms==
*''[[anyára]]''

==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[iaur]]''

==See also==
*'''''Yára''' [[Túro]]''
